resources.string: Metrodroid
Metrodroid reads information from some NFC smartcards for public transport.

Metrodroid reads some NFC smartcards for public transport.

ğŸ†• New in Metrodroid.
ğŸ“œ MIFARE Classic: not compatible with all devices - you need a device NXP NFC chipset to read this.
ğŸ— Encryption keys are required to read this card.
ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ CEPAS not compatible with all devices (ISO 14443-B).
ğŸ†” Only the card number can be read.
ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡ª Encryption keys are downloaded from the operator.

You require a NFC-compatible device to read cards.

Some agencies have encrypted cards. You need to acquire encryption keys to read them, which are generally unique to each card. Sorry, I canâ€™t help you with this.

Metrodroid and its authors are not affiliated with and public transit agency. Other agenciesâ€™ cards using Cubic Nextfare or ERG on MIFARE Classic may also work.

For more details about permissions required, please see the privacy policy.

This is a fork of Eric Butlerâ€™s Farebot, with support for additional cards and bug fixes.

This software is licensed under the GNU GPLv3+, source code is available at https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/
Fixes bugs, adds new features and data.\n\nMore details and known issues (in English): https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

â€¢ Adds support for Amiibo, Crimea Trolleybus, Kazan, Russian Umarsh and Santiago bip, and Warsaw card
â€¢ Improvements and fixes for Intercode, Kartu Multi Trip, RicaricaMi, Touch 'n Go and Troika cards
â€¢ Fixes some bugs that caused Metrodroid to crash, and some bugs with MIFARE Classic cards

More details and known issues: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Reads EMV bank, Malaysia KomuterLink, Pisa Carta Mobile, Georgia Metromoney, 1st-gen London Oyster, UAE Hafilat and Nol cards.
* Adds new stations for EZ-Link and ORCA cards.
* Fixes issues with Mobib reader.
* Adds support for importing binary MFC files and reading DESFire cards with locked directory lists.
* Many under-the-hood changes.

More details and known issues: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds support for Malaysia Tap â€™n Go, Otago Gocard, Rotorua SmartRide, Waikato BUSIT and Wellington Snapper cards.
* Adds many new route and station IDs.
* Improved FeliCa reader.
* Fixes issues with EZ-Link and Octopus cards.
* Many under-the-hood changes.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds support for Otago Gocard, Rotorua SmartRide, Waikato BUSIT and Wellington Snapper cards.
* Adds many new route and station IDs.
* Improved FeliCa reader.
* Fixes issues with EZ-Link and Octopus cards.
* Many under-the-hood changes.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds support for Adelaide Metrocard, many Chinese (PRC) cards, Clipper single tickets, Kiev Metro, Orlando SunCard, Rejsekort, SLAccess, Selecta, Tartu Bus and multiple Zolotaya Korona based cards.
* Fixes OV-Chipkaart reader.
* Reads serial number for AT-HOP.
* Many under-the-hood changes.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds support for CharlieCard, Go-to (Minneapolis), Hop Fastpass, Intercode (France), IstanbulKart, Mobib, Leap, RicaciraMi and Strelka cards.
* Fixes HSL reader.
* Adds new stations for Clipper and Kartu Multi Trip.
* Suica now shows the time of the 2 most recent trips.
* Improved MIFARE Classic key management.
* Many under-the-hood changes.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds support for Kartu Multi Trip, Opus, Podorozhnik, Rav-Kav, T-Money, Troika cards and single-trip Compass (Vancouver) cards.
* Fixes a crash bug for some Clipper cards.
* Many under-the-hood changes.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds timezone support for most cards.
* Clipper: Fix incorrect travel times.
* Opal: Fix incorrect travel times on Daylight Savings change days.
* New icons, accessibility improvements, and app install size reduced.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds experimental support for Metrocard (Christchurch, New Zealand).
* Fixes multiple issues with MIFARE Classic and Ultralight cards.
* Shows more information while reading a card.
* Opal: Handle unknown status "0xc".

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds Obfuscation Mode.
* Fix a crash with unknown CEPAS cards.
* Fix a crash with partially-read MIFARE Classic cards when viewing raw card details.
* Support negative balances on Cubic Nextfare cards.
* New stop IDs for Go card (Brisbane, Australia).
* Adds partial translations into Kabyle thanks to @belkacem77 and Norwegian BokmÃ¥l thanks to @comradekingu.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Adds support for SmartRider (WA, Australia).
* Adds translations into Dutch thanks to @Vistaus, French thanks to @Albirew, Hebrew thanks to @steets250
* MyWay: Auto-detect card by common key for newly scanned cards.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Multiple fixes for Cubic Nextfare cards.
* Fudan FM11RF08 cards are no longer falsely detected as Bilhete Ãšnico.
* Adds experimental support for MyWay (ACT, Australia).
* Works around MIFARE Classic bugs on some HTC and Sony devices.
* Fix permissions bugs on Android 6 and later.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

* Improve reliability authenticating with MIFARE Classic cards.
* Adds support for Octopus (Hong Kong), Shenzhen Tong and Transit Access Pass (Los Angeles, CA, US).
* Adds a generic reader for Cubic Nextfare MFC (based on Go card reader).
* Export to USB Storage now allows you to pick a location on Android 4.4 (KitKat) and later.
* Go card: Fares are now retrieved from the card, so should work with all stations. Added 7 extra stations. Now detects Adult and Concession cards.

* Now requires Android 4.1, to fix a map issue.
* Added support for viewing raw FeliCa data.
* Added support for MIFARE Ultralight, including raw data.
* Fixed an issue where 2 trips on different days may not show the date header on the earlier trip (Issue #15).
* Go card: Added 11 extra stops, thanks to data donations. Implement fare calculation, with some limitations.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

Farebot M is now Metrodroid.

* Implemented support for reading the card number from Myki (VIC, AU).
* Last digit of Go Card (Brisbane, AU) is now read.
* Improved handling of MIFARE DESFire cards.
* Fixed support for NETS Flashpay (Singapore) cards which are also credit cards (patch by @chrisplus).
* Japanese translation improved greatly (thanks to @naofum).
* Trips and Refills are now combined into "History" for all cards.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog

Happy new year!

* Added basic support for Go card (Brisbane and South East Queensland, AU). Requires encryption keys (which are unique to each card) and device with MIFARE Classic support. Limited stop support.
* Added card identification support for Adelaide Metrocard, AT HOP and Myki.
* Fixed importing individual cards from XML files.
* Various UI improvements.
* Minor bug fixes.

More details: https://github.com/micolous/metrodroid/wiki/Changelog
